name: Light Out
description:
Ligth Out is a game where you have to turn off all the lantern.

This game was made in 24h (and I take only 10 hours I think).

Input :

Q : Grab a cross

W : Turn off a lantern

E : Dash to the Left

R : Dash to  the Right

I had no time left to display the E and R key in the game but you can use it !

There is probably a lot of bugs, and the rope is a bit glitchy. Sorry ;)
